title: Why I Quit Writing (with Yasmin Nair)
itunes:title: Why I Quit Writing (with Yasmin Nair)
description:
Jessa speaks with cultural critic, academic, and leftist thinker Yasmin Nair about the exploitative, dumbed down, and click-baity hot take culture in which we all consume. They discuss trying to write and think in a sea of opinion, the way leftist magazines take advantage of young writers, and how readers can take responsibility for the world created. 

Support this podcast: http://patreon.com/publicintellectual
